quote: Ability Will Never Catch Up With The Demand For It.
author: Confucius

quote: Do not hate what you do not know, for the greater part of knowledge consists of what you do not know.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Where There Is No Struggle, There Is No Strength.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Monsters Are Real, And Ghosts Are Real Too. They Live Inside Us, And Sometimes, They Win.
author: Stephen King

quote: Allah will help him who moves in the way of Allah.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)
